title: TGS with Tracy Jordan
description: TGS (The Girlie Show) with Tracy Jordan is a late-night, live comedy showcase featuring satirical sketches and original musical performances.
starring: Tracy Jordan, Jenna Maroney, Josh Girard
altHero: Tracy Jordan, Jenna Maroney, and Josh Girard in a sketch
alt1: Maroney in a gold, glittery dress dancing in front of a line of dancers wearing short shorts and tall boots
alt2: Jordan dressed as a woman in a kitchen, the counter loaded with various meats
alt3: Maroney in a patriotic outfit singing next to a woman holding an American flag
alt4: Jordan as a scientist, yells “Noo!” as his robot machine smokes
